title: Parliament Live Updates: Oppn demands rollback of fuel price hike, seeks PM’s statement in LS - The Indian Express
content: Parliament Live Updates: Oppn demands rollback of fuel price hike, seeks PM’s statement in LS  The Indian Express
description: Budget Session 2022 India, Parliament Live Updates, 28 March: The Criminal Procedure (Identification) Bill, 2022 was introduced in the Lok Sabha Monday by Union Minister of State for Home Affairs Ajay Mishra Teni. Opposition raised objections over the Bill calling it "draconian".
